013package org.apache.juneau.http.remote;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.map;
017
018import java.lang.reflect.*;
019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
024
025/**
026 * Contains the meta-data about a remote proxy REST interface.
027 *
028 * <p>
029 * Captures the information in {@link Remote @Remote} annotations for caching and reuse.
030 *
031 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
032 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/RestRpc">REST/RPC</a>
033 * </ul>
034 */
035public class RrpcInterfaceMeta {
036
037   private final Map<Method,RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta> methods;
038   private final Map<String,RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta> methodsByPath;
039   private final String path;
040   private final Class<?> c;
041
042   /**
043    * Constructor.
044    *
045    * @param c
046    *    The interface class annotated with a {@link Remote @Remote} annotation.
047    *    <br>Note that the annotations are optional.
048    * @param uri
049    *    The absolute URL of the remote REST interface that implements this proxy interface.
050    *    <br>This is only used on the client side.
051    */
052   public RrpcInterfaceMeta(Class<?> c, String uri) {
053      this.c = c;
054      Value<String> path = Value.of("");
055      ClassInfo ci = ClassInfo.of(c);
056
057      ci.forEachAnnotation(Remote.class, x -> isNotEmpty(x.path()), x -> path.set(StringUtils.trimSlashes(x.path())));
058
059      Map<Method,RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta> methods = map();
060      ci.forEachPublicMethod(
061         x -> true,
062         x -> methods.put(x.inner(), new RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta(uri, x.inner()))
063      );
064
065      Map<String,RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta> methodsByPath = map();
066      methods.values().forEach(x -> methodsByPath.put(x.getPath(), x));
067
068      this.methods = u(methods);
069      this.methodsByPath = u(methodsByPath);
070      this.path = path.get();
071   }
072
073   /**
074    * Returns a map of all methods on this interface proxy keyed by HTTP path.
075    *
076    * @return
077    *    A map of all methods on this remote interface keyed by HTTP path.
078    *    <br>The keys never have leading slashes.
079    *    <br>The map is never <jk>null</jk>.
080    */
081   public Map<String,RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta> getMethodsByPath() {
082      return methodsByPath;
083   }
084
085   /**
086    * Returns the metadata about the specified method on this interface proxy.
087    *
088    * @param m The method to look up.
089    * @return Metadata about the method or <jk>null</jk> if no metadata was found.
090    */
091   public RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta getMethodMeta(Method m) {
092      return methods.get(m);
093   }
094
095   /**
096    * Returns the metadata about the specified method on this interface proxy by the path defined on the method.
097    *
098    * @param p The HTTP path to look for.
099    * @return Metadata about the method or <jk>null</jk> if no metadata was found.
100    */
101   public RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta getMethodMetaByPath(String p) {
102      return methodsByPath.get(p);
103   }
104
105   /**
106    * Returns the Java class of this interface.
107    *
108    * @return
109    *    The Java class of this interface.
110    *    <br>Never <jk>null</jk>.
111    */
112   public Class<?> getJavaClass() {
113      return c;
114   }
115
116   /**
117    * Returns the HTTP path of this interface.
118    *
119    * @return
120    *    The HTTP path of this interface.
121    *    <br>Never <jk>null</jk>.
122    *    <br>Never has leading or trailing slashes.
123    */
124   public String getPath() {
125      return path;
126   }
127}
